name: Golemight
description:
This game demo was made during the "ScoreSpace"  Jam

In this 2D donjon shooter, you play a golem who shoots to destroy some oppenents.

In this world every mob bounce of the walls.

It's a donjon map with different rooms  , you can change your shoot when you find an altar, you can also fight some mobs who give you scorepoint. 

Each mob don't give the same amount of score.

Your objective is  to get the highest score. 

With the left click you choose your direction, with SPACE you can shoot one of your bullet and with R all ur bullet. 

if you are in an ennemy room you need to beat them to change room using 

the WASD or ZQSD keys

to unlock yourself from this mode press the ENTER key while in an altar room

Dev Team : Tot0p, Axou89, mkarten and design : Sambre
